content: अभ्युपगमः {@--1@} Approach, arrival. {@--2@} Granting, admitting, accepting to be true <ls>P. VIII. 3. 74</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>; confession (as of guilt); <ls>Ratn. 2. 19.</ls> {@--3@} Undertaking, promising; निर्णय° <ls>M. 1</ls>; a contract, agreement, promise; <ls>Ms. 9. 53.</ls> {@--4@} Probable ascertainment, belief; judgment, a view accepted; <ls>Mv. 1. 38</ls>; supposition, inference. {@--5@} Analogy, affinity.
